name: The Valley (itch) (xed and elien)
description:
Plants have been your friends since you could remember; they speak to you in ways you can’t explain to others. Your family thinks your talent is useless, until now—you’ve just been accepted by an acclaimed biotech company as the newest assistant botanist for their incredibly secretive R&D department. They promise you will be taking care of a unique plant species; you weren't allowed to know more than that.

It doesn't matter to you, though. All that matters is that you'll be making a new friend soon.

Headphones recommended.

cw: potentially disturbing or upsetting imagery and sounds, brief depiction of transphobia

This is Part 1 of The Valley made for NaNoReNo2023. Part 2 will be added to the downloadable build at a later date, still within 2023.
